scripts.build: cd packages/tui && npm run build && cd ../ai && npm run build && cd ../agent && npm run build && cd ../coding-agent && npm run build && cd ../mom && npm run build && cd ../web-ui && npm run build && cd ../pods && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently --names "ai,agent,coding-agent,mom,web-ui,tui" --prefix-colors "cyan,yellow,red,white,green,magenta" "bun --cwd packages/ai run dev" "bun --cwd packages/agent run dev" "bun --cwd packages/coding-agent run dev" "bun --cwd packages/mom run dev" "bun --cwd packages/web-ui run dev" "bun --cwd packages/tui run dev"
scripts.dev:tsc: concurrently --names "ai,web-ui" --prefix-colors "cyan,green" "cd packages/ai && npm run dev:tsc" "cd packages/web-ui && npm run dev:tsc"
scripts.check: biome check --write --error-on-warnings . && tsgo --noEmit && bun --cwd packages/web-ui run check
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch -ws --no-git-tag-version && node scripts/sync-versions.js && rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor -ws --no-git-tag-version && node scripts/sync-versions.js && rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.version:major: npm version major -ws --no-git-tag-version && node scripts/sync-versions.js && rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run check
scripts.publish: npm run prepublishOnly && npm publish -ws --access public
scripts.publish:dry: npm run prepublishOnly && npm publish -ws --access public --dry-run
